name: Broccoli Chicken Casserole
recipeIngredient: 3 Whole Chicken breasts (cooked, boned and cut in pieces)
2 Cans condensed cream of chicken soup

recipeInstructions.text: Place uncooked broccoli in 9x13 baking dish. Season with salt and pepper.
Place cut-up chicken pieces on top. Make a sauce with soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice and curry powder. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with cheese.
If made 1 day in advance, refrigerate and bake slightly longer
